recipes.title: Classic Buttermilk Pancakes
recipes.description: Light and fluffy traditional pancakes with a subtle tangy flavor
instructions: Whisk dry ingredients together in a large bowl
Mix wet ingredients in a separate bowl
Combine wet and dry ingredients until just mixed
Heat griddle to medium-high
Pour 1/4 cup batter for each pancake
Flip when bubbles form on surface
Cook until golden brown

recipes.title: Blueberry Ricotta Pancakes
recipes.description: Creamy, tender pancakes studded with fresh blueberries
instructions: Mix ricotta, milk, eggs, honey, and vanilla
Combine flour, baking powder, and salt separately
Fold wet ingredients into dry ingredients
Gently fold in blueberries
Cook on medium heat until bubbles form
Flip and cook other side until golden

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Pancakes
recipes.description: Hearty whole grain pancakes with chocolate chips
instructions: Combine oats with milk and let sit for 5 minutes
Mix remaining wet ingredients with oat mixture
Stir in dry ingredients until just combined
Fold in chocolate chips
Cook on medium heat until bubbles appear
Flip and cook until done

recipes.title: Lemon Poppyseed Pancakes
recipes.description: Light and zesty pancakes with a delightful crunch
instructions: Combine flour, poppy seeds, baking powder, and salt
Whisk milk, eggs, lemon juice, and butter
Add sugar and lemon zest to wet ingredients
Mix wet and dry ingredients until just combined
Cook on medium heat until bubbles form
Flip and cook until golden

recipes.title: Banana Walnut Pancakes
recipes.description: Moist pancakes with ripe bananas and crunchy walnuts
instructions: Mash bananas in a large bowl
Add milk, eggs, butter, and vanilla to bananas
Mix flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar separately
Combine wet and dry ingredients
Fold in chopped walnuts
Cook until bubbles form and edges start to dry
Flip and cook until golden brown

recipes.title: Pumpkin Spice Pancakes
recipes.description: Seasonal favorite with warm autumn spices
instructions: Mix pumpkin puree, milk, eggs, and butter
Combine flour, spices, baking powder, and salt
Mix wet and dry ingredients until just combined
Let batter rest for 5 minutes
Cook on medium heat until bubbles appear
Flip and cook until done
Serve with maple syrup and pecans
